Lyric:
[00:01.210]Let me know if we’re on
[00:03.750]Let me know if we’re off
[00:06.870]Let me know
[00:09.050]Let me know
[00:11.240]I’m sitting here in the middle of the road,
[00:14.090]With my clothes on my back, 
[00:14.800]wondering where I’m gonna go
[00:22.000]Thrown to the ground not a lover but a girl,
[00:24.250]Looking back at the days 
[00:25.460]when I didn’t know the world
[00:30.460]I’ve been thrown by the wayside,
[00:33.150]Got dragged out by the riptide
[00:35.760]Take me back to the daylight
[00:41.190]I know now what it is to
[00:43.680]Sink so low that you can’t move,
[00:46.360]I’ve been paralysed by you
[00:48.880]I’ve been paralysed by you
[00:54.530]Let me know what to do
[00:57.120]Is it all gone for you
[00:59.700]Let me know
[01:05.280]Let me know what to do
[01:08.460]Is it all gone for you
[01:10.410]Let me know
[01:15.290]I’m sitting here I got nothing but my name
[01:17.530]Got a bag full of ash and a pocket full of shame
[01:25.850]Head to the floor send a wish up to the sky but
[01:28.480]I’m waking up to nothing
[01:29.620] and I have to wonder why
[01:35.070]I’ve been thrown by the wayside,
[01:37.150]Got dragged out by the riptide
[01:39.800]Take me back to the daylight
[01:45.300]I know now what it is to
[01:47.740]Sink so low that you can’t move,
[01:50.430]I’ve been paralysed by you
[01:53.160]I’ve been paralysed by you
[02:19.850]I’ve been thrown by the wayside,
[02:22.430]Got dragged out by the riptide
[02:25.210]Take me back to the daylight
[02:30.490]I know now what it is to
[02:33.370]Sink so low that you can’t move,
[02:35.840]I’ve been paralysed by you
[02:38.510]I’ve been paralysed by you
